akn:section.akn:heading: Fission and fusion energy materials research program

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Along with the budget request of the President submitted to Congress for fiscal year 2007, the Secretary shall establish a research and development program on material science issues presented by advanced fission reactors and the fusion energy program of the Department.
